data.message: That is so bitchen to hear that cause in reality all of US are pretty much the same but just the distance gap seperates our productivity to get close with our love and groviness....If the world could understand this the whole lot would be much better and safer.....with no liars cheaters or thieves.....This triangle is very much in place now because people generally are into themselves and selfish and greedy......We can only change the world with teamwork not with the general thought of one leader like OUR NEXT PRESIDENT.....We the people should really consider a more socialistic society like they have in Canada.....They get along just fine and reduce mega problematic issues and reduce the crime rate tremenduceley
